setObservations

void setObservations(double[] observations,
                     boolean[] valid)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
Sets the observations to compute the PDFs from. Cannot be called in conjunction with start/add/finaliseAddObservations. valid is a time series (with time indices the same as destination) indicating whether the observation at that point is valid.

Parameters:
source - observations for the source variable
destValid -

java.lang.Exception
